title: Allison Kneisel
text:
Greetings!
From urban ponds to remote lakes, people rely on aquatic systems for physical and cultural services. I study aquatic systems to 1) understand how the landscape context of lakes, ponds, and wetlands influence their structure and function and 2) explore how these systems are changing through time.
I am currently a PhD Candidate at the University of Wisconsin â€“ Madison in the Ecosystem and Landscape Ecology Lab where I am studying urban ponds, wetland ecosystem services, and lake temporal dynamics in the Upper Midwest of the US.
